Description: This beautiful evening dress feature sheer bodice with intricate bead work creates a floral pattern that extends from one shoulder diagonally to the waistline and the sheer back, and cascades into the skirt.  Asymmetrical side cutout with floor length long skirt makes this gown sexy and sophisticated.
